testsuite.name: TopSecretSplitRest Controller Tests

testcase.name: Should handle special characters in satellite name
Should return 500 when service throws exception during save
Should return 400 for malformed POST request
Should process split data and return location
Should return 404 when insufficient satellite data
Should save satellite data and return confirmation
